price: Sila shariikota (kan murtee isaanii dhugoomsu)tu isaaniif tahee? Yoo kan dhugaa dubbatan ta'aniif shariikota isaaniitiin haa dhufanu.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: am lahum shurakāu falyatū bishurakāihim in kānū ṣādiqīna
